row_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) = 2)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(win) > 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(is_returning) >= 1)
col_sql: id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) = 0)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens WHERE season_no = 15)
id IN (SELECT id FROM queens GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(lip_sync_wins) >= 4)
row_desc: Queen has two mini challenge wins.
Queen has at least one mini challenge win.
Queen returned to the competition during any season.
col_desc: Queen has zero lip sync wins.
Queen has at least four lip sync wins.
